thread.title: BRIEF-Impinj Announces Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.45

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Impinj Announces Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.45
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Impinj Inc:
* IMPINJ ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 REVENUE FELL 20 PERCENT TO $26.9 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $23.25 MILLION TO $25.25 MILLION * Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.45 * INCREASING REVENUE OUTLOOK FOR Q1 OF 2018 BY $3.25 MILLION, TO BETWEEN $23.25 MILLION AND $25.25 MILLION
* SEES Q1 NON-GAAP NET LOSS PER SHARE FROM LOSS OF $0.42 TO LOSS OF $0.35
* QTRLY NON-GAAP NET LOSS OF $0.28 PER DILUTED SHARE
* SEES Q1 GAAP NET LOSS PER SHARE FROM LOSS OF $0.74 TO LOSS OF $0.65
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.19, REVENUE VIEW $29.5 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.38, REVENUE VIEW $21.2 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
